column5: Great location centrally located between DFW airport and Love.  12 Miles from DFW Airport- 10 Miles from Dallas Love Airport 15 Miles from Downtown Dallas 15 Miles from AT&T Stadium- Dallas Cowboys 15 Miles from American Airlines Center- Dallas Mav 15 Miles from Dallas Galleria Just minutes from Dallas, Grapevine, Southlake, Coppell, Carrollton, and Lewisville.
